title: Top 5 Border Falsehoods Pushed by Congressional Democrats and the Media – The White House
content:
Immigration	

March 7, 2019
7 minute readIllegal immigration is not compassionate. It’s inhumane, unjust, and cruel.
						President Donald J. Trump					Homeland Security Secretary Kirstjen Nielsen spoke before Congress yesterday about the security and humanitarian crisis on our southern border. Acknowledging that such a crisis exists would make Democrats accountable for working with President Trump to solve it. Their leaders have already gone on the record to say they will not.Instead, they hope to keep a lid on the ugly, painful truths behind America’s broken immigration system. It is important to set the record straight.
